items.headline: Trump says affordability is a ‘hoax,’ but consumers should expect more pain in 2026
items.summary_en: Tariffs, an AI boom, geopolitical divisions and a new administration ushered in a unique, unsettling year for consumers.

items.headline: Bitcoin will climb to $143,000, according to this Wall Street forecast
items.summary_en: Bitcoin will rally to $143,000 next year as investors continue to increase digital-asset adoption through exchange-traded funds, according to a new Wall Street forecast.

items.headline: A sell signal has been triggered at Bank of America. What typically happens next.
items.summary_en: A flow of money into stocks and more equities participating in the bull market have triggered a sell signal that historically has led to big pullbacks, according to a new Bank of America report.

items.headline: Nike says turnaround plans are ‘in the middle innings,’ but investor worries remain
items.summary_en: Nike Inc. reported fiscal second-quarter results that beat Wall Street’s expectations, but its margins shrank, and management said the sneaker and athletic-gear giant was “in the middle innings” of its comeback plan.

items.headline: 5 years and millions of dollars later, Rob Lowe’s custom-built Montecito mansion is complete
